headline: vp, fixed income
author_position: Vice President, Taxable Fixed Income Trader
pros: Direct interaction with management was always a plus
cons: small balance sheet, smaller firm was difficult to weather tough market

headline: They don't get it.
cons: Impatient, unrealistic view of building a business.  massive turnover.  overinflated capabilities

headline: First in charge provides little value. The employees work hard, which drives the company's success.
pros: Some great people that I will keep in touch with for years. It was a learning experience that I will apply to my current and future positions.
cons: Employees treat eachother great, but upper management cares very little about the employees.
